edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq

Interface QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener<String,QuestionWindow,Integer>, Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    QuestionWindow

    public static interface QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener
extends EventListener<String,QuestionWindow,Integer>
    EventListener Interface for listening to question related events fired by a QuestionWindow component.

    copyright © Ville-Video 2013

    Since:
    10.11.2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String QUESTION_FINISHED_EVENT
      Fired every time when the QuestionWindow has asked one question.
      static String TIMESLOT_FINISHED_EVENT
      Fired when the QuestionWindow has asked all of the questions in the time slot.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void on(String eventName, QuestionWindow source, Integer timeSlot)
      QuestionWindow Component has triggered an event and corresponding listener method is executed.

    • Field Detail

        Fired when the QuestionWindow has asked all of the questions in the time slot.

    • Method Detail

      • on

        void on(String eventName,
      QuestionWindow source,
      Integer timeSlot)
        QuestionWindow Component has triggered an event and corresponding listener method is executed.
        Specified by:
        on in interface EventListener<String,QuestionWindow,Integer>
        Parameters:
        eventName - name of the QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener event.
        source - the source component of the VideojsListener event.
        timeSlot - the question time slot handled by the QuestionWindow.
